main event: A bright light object was observed maneuvering and then taking off at high speed over Grand Bahama Island.
interesting points: The object was elliptical in shape and described as 3-4 times the size of a star., It stopped about 3 miles off from the observer for about 2 minutes., The object disappeared from view in about 15 seconds after taking off., No sound or trail was observed during the sighting., The report indicates that the sighting is consistent with other UFO reports but lacks sufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Not specified, but the observation was made by an individual.
